txt.en: The Orcs are intent to not let anyone enter Writhendowns. They need to be defeated.
You have successfully cleared the Orc Rider threat from the border of Writhendowns, making travel to and from, much easier.
Orc riders can be found along the border of the Wold and Writhendowns.
Orcs roam the Writhendowns in great numbers, prowling to and fro -- as Thrymm described.\n\nYou should defeat Orcs as you roam the Writhendowns.
Orcs roam the Writhendowns in great numbers, prowling to and fro -- as Thrymm described.\n\nYou should defeat Orcs as you roam the Writhendowns.
You have defeated a number of scouting Orcs at the Wold-Writhendowns border, but the enemy presence still presses upon the land.
Orcs roam the Writhendowns in great numbers, prowling to and fro -- as Thrymm described.
